Attributes.name: activebackground
Attributes.Description: Background color when the button is under the cursor.

Attributes.name: activeforeground
Attributes.Description: Foreground color when the button is under the cursor.

Attributes.name: highlightcolor
Attributes.Description: The color of the focus highlight when the widget has focus.

Attributes.name: bd
Attributes.Description: Border width in pixels. Default is 2.

Attributes.name: command
Attributes.Description: Function or method to be called when the button is clicked.

Attributes.name: font
Attributes.Description: Text font to be used for the button's label.

Attributes.name: image
Attributes.Description: Image to be displayed on the button (instead of text).

Attributes.name: justify
Attributes.Description: How to show multiple text lines: LEFT to left-justify each line; CENTER to center them; or RIGHT to right-justify.

Attributes.name: padx
Attributes.Description: Additional padding left and right of the text.

Attributes.name: pady
Attributes.Description: Additional padding above and below the text.

Attributes.name: relief
Attributes.Description: Relief specifies the type of the border. Some of the values are SUNKEN, RAISED, GROOVE, and RIDGE.

Attributes.name: state
Attributes.Description: Set this option to DISABLED to gray out the button and make it unresponsive. Has the value ACTIVE when the mouse is over it. Default is NORMAL.

Attributes.name: underline
Attributes.Description: Default is -1, meaning that no character of the text on the button will be underlined. If nonnegative, the corresponding text character will be underlined.

Attributes.name: wraplength
Attributes.Description: If this value is set to a positive number, the text lines will be wrapped to fit within this length.
